# <nowiki>[[InstallingSoftware#installing-a-package|Install the following package]]</nowiki>: '''''<nowiki>[[apt:xchat|xchat]]</nowiki>'''''
# Go to ''Applications > Internet > XChat IRC''
# Choose "!FreeNode" from the list of networks
# Click "Connect"
# Click ''Server > Join a Channel'' in the menu system<<BR>>(a ''channel'' is the name IRC gives to chat rooms)
# Type the name of the channel you want to join<<BR>>(channel names always begin with a `#`)
